name: Electric Toothbrush
description: Advanced electric toothbrush with multiple brushing modes and a pressure sensor for optimal cleaning.

name: Fluoride Toothpaste
description: Clinically proven fluoride toothpaste for cavity protection, enamel strengthening, and fresh breath.

name: Dental Floss (Mint)
description: Shred-resistant dental floss with a refreshing mint flavor for effective plaque removal between teeth.

name: Mouthwash (Alcohol-Free)
description: Gentle, alcohol-free mouthwash that kills germs, freshens breath, and supports gum health.

name: Tongue Scraper
description: Stainless steel tongue scraper designed for effective removal of bacteria and improvement of oral hygiene.
